name: The Crazy Smiley DEMO
description:
Arrows Up, Down, Left, And Right To Colour. This Project Took Some Minutes To Make XD

Made 3 Weeks Ago!         I Hope You'll Enjoy The DEMO Version Of The Crazy Smiley Colouring Game!        This Game Is Nothing So Special But It's FUN!  Soon I'll Add Updates So Go And Download Me!!!

This Game Is Not Horror, Trust Me! (But Actually The Crazy Smiley Looks Creepy)

Enjoy Your DEMO Game ;)
